strokes.description: Adding bouncy wiggle lines that hop and skip across the existing circles, enhancing the playful movement pattern

parsed_instruction.reasoning: The playful mood is perfectly suited to this composition with its light, bouncing elements. By choosing the wiggle brush and creating undulating lines that dance across the circles, we amplify the sense of joyful movement and carefree energy. The moderate drawing speed (t=2) maintains the lively, bouncing rhythm while keeping the strokes controlled enough to complement the existing elements.
